about_the_game:
Welcome, dad bod enthusiasts; It's time for the most anticipated event of your local neighborhood! STUDS is a 3D multiplayer party game where up to 4 players compete in a series of 'dadly' events to be crowned the Ultimate Dad. Test your Dad-like Reflexes as you race baby strollers down the street, or be the first to gather all the items on the hardware store shopping list.

MULTIPLAYER MADNESS


REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER
  • Invite up to 3 friends to play online with Steam's Remote Play Together feature.
LOCAL MULTIPLAYER
  • Connect up to 4 controllers to play split-screen multiplayer, or play against AI.

MINIGAMES

Choose between three unique game modes:

BABY STROLLER RACE
  • Be the first dad to cross the finish line with their stroller as you race through your neighborhood. Nimbly avoid obstacles while sabotaging other players, either by throwing your stroller or by using player-activated obstacles to help close the gap between dads on the track​.
THE DAD DEPOT
  • Gather the required items and bring them to the register before the other dads steal them​. The store's aisles are randomized and explosive propane tanks are scattered around, so even experienced dads will have to put their dad reflexes to the test.
PENNY PINCHER
  • It's dads versus kids in a battle for control of the house's appliances. Dads attempt to catch the mischievous kids and put them in timeout while turning off appliances to reduce the total cost of the bill. As kids, escape the dads in the house while you turn on appliances and cause the monthly utility bill to skyrocket.

Super Totally Ultimate Dad Showdown was created by a small team of students as their senior year capstone project.

name: Super Totally Ultimate Dad Showdown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You might have the bod, the jokes, and an outrageous sense of fashion, but do you have what it takes to earn the coveted title of ultimate dad? STUDS is a student made vibrant party game where you face off against other dads in a series of events to prove that who is the 'dadliest' of them all!
